ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: NHS NEL CSU, 2nd Floor, 1 Lower Marsh

SHORT_DESCR.P: NHS NEL CSU on behalf of NHS England London Region (hereafter referred to as “The Authority”) invites interested, suitably qualified and experienced providers of primary medical GP services (the Services) to attend a Market Engagement Event in advance of publication of the Tranche 6 (T6) London APMS Programme.

This procurement process relates to the contracts for the provision of primary medical GP services (the Services) to be delivered through an Alternative Provider of Medical Services (APMS) contract. The Commissioners of these services include the following Clinical Commissioning Groups (CCGs) acting under delegated authority from NHS England; NHS Barking and Dagenham CCG, NHS Bexley CCG, NHS Greenwich CCG, NHS Hounslow CCG, NHS Lambeth CCG, NHS Redbridge CCG and NHS Southwark CCG.
Tranche 6 (T6) of the London APMS Programme includes 10 (ten) APMS contracts in different parts of London.

MAIN_SITE.P: Bedfont Practice, Imperial Road, Bedfont, Middlesex, TW14 8AG.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Contract start date: 1.10.2018. See ITT documents for further details on specification.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: As a result of this procurement exercise an agreement will be established with the successful Bidder for each Lot for a period of 5 years, with the Commissioner having the option to extend for up to a further 5 years, (subject to NHS England internal approval). Values shown are indicative and relate to the full 10-year extended contract duration.

INFO_ADD.P: All completed bids must be submitted by 12:00 (noon) on 14.5.2018. The ITT reference for this tender is RTL093P.

This procurement is split into Lots. Bidders may bid for 1, all or any combination of the Lots as set out in tender documentation however commissioners do not intend to award more than 5 contracts to any single provider. A separate APMS Contract for each Lot will be awarded to the successful Providers. Please refer to the associated published documentation published with the tender for further information.
The Procurement process is facilitated entirely online via the stated e-procurement portal ProContract (the Portal).

Interested Bidders must access the ITT documentation via the link provided and submit a ITT response via the online questionnaires on the e-Tendering portal “ProContract” before the submission deadline of 14.5.2018 at 12:00 (noon). See procurement documentation (ITT) for more details.
The ITT can be found at https://procontract.due-north.com/Advert?advertId=735ded4f-863b-e811-80eb-005056b64545

NHS England will adopt the Open procedure as a template for this procurement. However, the Services to which this ITT relates fall within Schedule 3 to the Public Contracts Regulations 2015 (the Regulations). Neither the publication of the advertisement, the use of a ITT stage, nor the use of the term “Open Procedure” nor any other indication (including any statement in this advert or the ITT documentation) shall be taken to mean that the Authority intends to hold itself bound by any of the Regulations, save those applicable to procurements under the Light Touch Regime (LTR).
